word:
MR No. 1407 - An Appeal to Exercise Faith, Obey Christ, and Grow in Spirituality
 
     (Written May 25, 1900, at "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, N.S.W., to "Mr. Baker, Dear friend and brother.") 


     How long are you going to encourage a divided heart? The Lord is calling for you to come to Him with all your burdens and perplexities. He wants you to come into harmony with Him.
